name: WRAY COMMUNITY HOSPITAL
description: Wray Community Hospital is a critical access hospital providing rural healthcare services.
sampleDescriptions: Bridge Consulting partners with Wray Community Hospital to educate Members of Congress and USDA about both the challenges and opportunities that frontier and rural hospitals confront.
Bridge Consulting partners with Wray Community Hospital in Colorado to educate Members of Congress and the USDA about the importance of investing in rural and frontier critical access hospitals.
Bridge Consulting and Wray Community Hospital interacted with Members of Congress to discuss S. 3105 - The Hospital Revitalization Act, which provides much needed capital to build new hospitals.
